message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Considering its quality and the value it brings, I propose a price of $110. Let me know what you think!

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you highlighting the product's quality. However, $110 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $105 for it, given my budget constraints.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to negotiate. Considering the value of the product and your interest, I would like to offer it to you for $107. This price reflects the value we place on your satisfaction while keeping it within your budget. Please let me know if this proposal suits you.
